main event: Six white lights with no visible shape were sighted for 10-12 minutes, also observed by aircraft in the area.
interesting points: The lights were observed by witnesses from the ground as well as an aircraft., The sighting lasted for approximately 10-12 minutes., The report mentions the possibility that the lights were related to aircraft refueling operations., No contact was made with the observing aircraft for further information., The lights were described as large white lights with no identifiable shape.
sighted object: six white lights in the sky
witness description: viewed by the witness's wife and one other family member
